description.value:
The ghost causes one creature within 30 feet to relive the ghost's death.

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:] save or see and feel what the ghost did, taking [[/r {1d4}[persistent,mental]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Mental Damage} per 2 levels the ghost has.

All other creatures are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} to the target until the persistent damage ends.
